jobDetails.jobDescription: Job DescriptionBI Manager - Bangalore Office Are you an expert in business intelligence with a strong background in data engineering? Do you have a passion for turning complex data into valuable insights that drive business decisions? Are you an experienced leader capable of managing and mentoring a team of BI professionals and data engineers? If so, we invite you to join our Bangalore office as a BI Manager and Technical Lead.The OpportunityAs the BI Manager and Technical Lead, you will be responsible for managing a group of BI professionals and data engineers. You will generate valuable insights through data analysis, visualization, and reporting based on business requirements following a design first approach. This is a role that requires a strong combination of technical and leadership skills.What You'll Do: Technical Leadership and Data EngineeringPlay a key role in both technical and leadership aspects of the BI function.Oversee a team of BI and data engineers in the Bangalore Office.Balance hands-on work with management responsibilities, ensuring that the team is effectively delivering full lifecycle of BI & Data offerings including:Structured data models typically in SnowflakeSemi-structured data models on AWS FSx and AWS S3Data pipelines & ETL processes via SQL, Informatica, PythonData APIs in Python Flask containers in AWS, GCPLeverage AI for analytics and accelerate of development Data visualizations and dashboards using Tableau.Execute automated deployment processes on Jenkins or GitHub Actions. Collaboration with other BI leaders on data strategies and vendor managementBusiness Requirement Analysis & Technical SpecificationAssist business analysts with collecting stakeholders’ requirements. Translate business requirements into detailed technical specifications. Work closely with the team to ensure accurate and timely delivery of BI and data solutions based on technical specifications. Training & MentorshipProvide guidance, mentorship, and training to the BI and data engineering team members. Demonstrate best practice by on-hands execution of projects along with staff.Foster a culture of continuous learning and professional development within the team. Encourage knowledge sharing and collaboration among team members. What You'll Bring: Experience:Minimum 6 years of experience in business intelligence and data engineering, with at least 3 years in a leadership role (Manager, Lead, etc.). Proven track record of successfully managing BI projects and delivering valuable insights through data analysis and visualization. Strong understanding of data engineering concepts and tools, including IICS (Informatica Intelligent Cloud Services) batch and real-time integrations, Python, and SQL. Experience leverage data-as-a-service offerings in cloud environments including at least one AI-enabled project.Experience estimating and managing vendor costs.Knowledge of both SQL and Non-SQL platforms.Experience with Tableau or similar for data visualization and dashboard creation. Familiarity with automated deployment processes using Jenkins or GitHub Actions. Leadership & CommunicationProven ability to lead, manage, and mentor a team of BI professionals and data engineers. Strong communication and collaboration skills in English, with the ability to work effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Experience in translating business requirements into technical specificationsExperience managing delivery deadlines within a Sprint development approach.Education & CertificationsBachelor’s degree in computer science, IT, engineering or a related field Relevant certifications in BI, AI, data engineering, or data visualization tools are highly desirable. The Location:This role will be based out of The Leela Office located on the 4th Floor, Airport Road, Kodihalli, Bangalore- 560008. Our expectation at this time, is that you would work HYBRID – work from our office on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays with flexibility to work from home on Mondays and Fridays.
